title: Buyeo FC
text: Buyeo FC was a <a href="South%20Korea">South Korean</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> club based in the <a href="Administrative%20divisions%20of%20South%20Korea">county</a> of <a href="Buyeo%20County">Buyeo</a>. The club was a member of the <a href="K3%20League">K3 League</a>, an semi-professional league and the fourth tier of league football in South Korea, since the <a href="2016_K3_League">2016</a> season.
